column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you don't live in Chicago or Illinois expect to pay a HIGH entrance fee of $23 (Dec 2014).  These places are out of control on entry fees.  If you are local or a state resident
column2: you will need to show your drivers license to prove it
column3: you do get a discount.   Due to the high cost of entry
column4: I would plan to stay a while once you are here.  Come early and wear walking shoes.
